jollyRoger.description: A sawshark skull with a saw-shaped nose, resembling Arlong's distinctive feature
jollyRoger.symbolism: Represents Arlong's sawshark fish-man heritage and his fearsome reputation

statusHistory.reason: Operating in the Conomi Islands, East Blue

keyMoments.title: Arlong Pirates Introduction
keyMoments.description: The Arlong Pirates are revealed as the dominant force in the Conomi Islands, ruling through terror, extortion, and a corrupt alliance with the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the primary antagonist crew of the Arlong Park Arc.

keyMoments.title: Corrupt Alliance with Marines
keyMoments.description: The crew's corrupt relationship with Captain Nezumi is revealed, showing how they maintain power.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the systemic nature of their control over the region.

ideology.primaryGoal: Conquer the East Blue and establish fish-man supremacy
ideology.philosophy: Fish-men are superior to humans and should rule over them
ideology.methods: Terror, extortion, corruption, and systematic oppression

alliances.description: Arlong bribes Captain Nezumi to ensure Marine non-interference

conflicts.description: Conflict begins when Zoro is captured and Nami's connection is revealed

reveals.information: Controls the Conomi Islands through monthly tribute system backed by violence
Maintains power through bribing Marine Captain Nezumi
All-fish-man crew (except Nami) with members from the Grand Line
Previously connected to Jinbe, one of the Seven Warlords
